overview.title: Overview
overview.subtitle: General statistics and overall performance
overview.winRateTooltip: Percentage of winning trades relative to total number of trades. Calculated as: (Number of winning trades / Total number of trades) × 100
overview.totalPnLTooltip: Total net profit or loss for the selected period, after deducting all fees and commissions. Corresponds to the sum of all net_pnl of trades
overview.currentWinningStreakTooltip: Current streak of consecutive days with positive P/L. Only days with trades are counted (calendar days without trades are ignored). The streak resets to 0 in case of a loss.
overview.maxWinningStreakTooltip: Record of consecutive days with positive P/L

performanceRatios.title: Performance Ratios
performanceRatios.subtitle: Advanced metrics to analyze your trading strategy
performanceRatios.profitFactorTooltip: Ratio between total gains and total losses. > 1.0 = profitable, > 2.0 = excellent
performanceRatios.winLossRatioTooltip: Ratio between the number of winning and losing trades. > 1.0 = more gains than losses
performanceRatios.recoveryRatioTooltip: Ratio between the best trade and the worst loss. > 1.0 = best gain covers worst loss
performanceRatios.pnlPerTradeTooltip: Average gain or loss per trade. Indicates average profitability of each operation
performanceRatios.feesRatioTooltip: Percentage of fees relative to total P/L. < 10% = reasonable fees, > 20% = high fees
performanceRatios.volumePnLRatioTooltip: Trading efficiency per volume unit. Higher = better capital efficiency
performanceRatios.frequencyTooltip: Average number of trades per trading day. Indicates activity and trading style
performanceRatios.durationRatioTooltip: Ratio between average duration of winning and losing trades. > 1.0 = winning trades last longer than losing ones
performanceRatios.recoveryTimeTooltip: Average time (in number of trades) needed to recover to previous level after a drawdown. Lower = better recovery. N/A = no complete recovery occurred
performanceRatios.maxDrawdownTooltip: Largest decline from a peak (in %). Risk indicator. Lower = less risk. Global = all time, Period = selected period
performanceRatios.maxDrawdownGlobalTooltip: Largest decline from a peak (all time). Risk indicator. Lower = less risk.
performanceRatios.maxRunupTooltip: Largest rise from a low point
performanceRatios.riskRewardRatioTooltip: Average ratio between average win and average loss. > 1.0 = average wins are greater than average losses
performanceRatios.expectancyTooltip: Mathematical expectation per trade = (Win Rate × Avg Win) - (Loss Rate × Avg Loss). > 0 = profitable strategy
performanceRatios.sharpeRatioTooltip: Return adjusted to total volatility. Measures excess return per unit of risk. > 1.0 = good, > 2.0 = excellent
performanceRatios.sortinoRatioTooltip: Return adjusted to negative volatility only. Similar to Sharpe but only penalizes losses. > 1.0 = good
performanceRatios.calmarRatioTooltip: Annual return / Maximum Drawdown. > 1.0 = good return relative to risk. Requires at least 30 days of trading to be calculated
performanceRatios.tradeEfficiencyTooltip: Percentage of trades where Take Profit was reached. Higher = better execution

tradesAnalysis.title: Trades Analysis
tradesAnalysis.subtitle: Details of winning and losing trades
tradesAnalysis.averageWinLossRatioTooltip: Ratio between average win and average loss. > 1.0 = average wins are greater than average losses (profitable strategy)
tradesAnalysis.breakEvenTradesTooltip: Number of break-even trades: trades with P/L = 0 or winning trades (P/L > 0) without Take Profit reached (TP1 and TP2+ not reached)
tradesAnalysis.averageTradeCostTooltip: Average cost (fees + commissions) per trade. Calculated by dividing total fees by total number of trades

advancedAnalysis.title: Advanced Analysis
advancedAnalysis.subtitle: Detailed metrics and behavioral analysis
advancedAnalysis.consecutiveGainsTooltip: Longest sequence of consecutive days with positive P/L. Only days with trades are counted (calendar days without trades are ignored)
advancedAnalysis.consecutiveLossesTooltip: Longest sequence of consecutive days with negative P/L. Only days with trades are counted (calendar days without trades are ignored)
advancedAnalysis.dailySequencesTooltip: Sequences of consecutive days based only on days where trades occurred
advancedAnalysis.globalSequencesTooltip: Sequences of consecutive trades in chronological order, regardless of days
advancedAnalysis.consecutiveGainsGlobalTooltip: Longest sequence of consecutive winning trades in chronological order
advancedAnalysis.consecutiveLossesGlobalTooltip: Longest sequence of consecutive losing trades in chronological order

riskReward.title: Risk/Reward Ratio
riskReward.subtitle: Analysis of planned vs actual risk/reward ratio
riskReward.averagePlannedRRTooltip: Average Risk/Reward ratio planned at trade entry
riskReward.tradesWithPlannedRRTooltip: Number of trades with a defined planned R:R
riskReward.averageActualRRTooltip: Average Risk/Reward ratio actually obtained at trade exit
riskReward.tradesWithActualRRTooltip: Number of trades with a calculated actual R:R
riskReward.planRespectRateTooltip: Percentage of trades where actual R:R is greater than or equal to planned R:R
riskReward.tradesWithBothRRTooltip: Number of trades with both planned and actual R:R
riskReward.noDataMessage: No R:R data available. Add a Stop Loss and planned Take Profit when creating or modifying a trade to see R:R statistics.

exportModal.title: Export statistics
exportModal.subtitle: Generate a PDF or Excel report
exportModal.modelNameRequiredMessage: Please enter a name for the model.
exportModal.confirmExportMessage: Do you want to generate a {{format}} report for the account {{account}}?
exportModal.exportErrorMessage: An error occurred while exporting. Please try again.
